title: Inter-School Football Championship Finals
description: The championship finals of the Nyanza Region Inter-School Football League. Teams from Kisumu, Kericho, Kisii, and Nakuru compete for glory. Watch live with commentaries in English and Swahili.

title: Nyanza Rugby Championship 2025
description: Intense rugby tournaments featuring the best schools across the Nyanza Region. Train alongside established coaches and develop championship-winning skills.

title: 2024 Nyanza Football League Winners Ceremony
description: Memorable finals that determined the champions of the Nyanza Region. Relive the winning moments from our most attended sports event with 5000+ spectators.

title: Kenya Inter-County Games Trials
description: Selection trials for the Kenya Inter-County Games. County scouts and national selectors will evaluate top athletes from Kisumu, Kericho, Nakuru and Kisii.

title: Nyanza Girls Hockey Championship
description: Premier hockey championship celebrating female athletes across the Nyanza Region. Teams compete in A and B divisions with professional umpires and live scoring.

title: Nyanza Schools Netball Championship
description: Inter-school netball competition bringing together teams from all Nyanza secondary schools. Build networks and showcase talent with coaches from national teams present.

title: Nyanza Schools Athletics Trials
description: Weekly athletics training and trials for track and field athletes. Coached by certified professionals with focus on middle and long-distance running events.

title: Nyanza Region Sports Excellence Award Ceremony
description: Annual celebration honoring outstanding young athletes and coaches across the Nyanza Region. Prize awards and scholarships for the best performers of the year.

title: Nyanza Tennis Development Series
description: Monthly tennis tournaments for development of young talent. Open to schools across Nyanza with professional coaching and talent identification for national teams.
